author: Tony Tobin
method: Heat the strained cherry juice in a small pan over a medium heat. Add the sugar, red wine and orange juice, bring to the boil and reduce by half. Add the cherries and cream and pour into a tall glass, to serve.
ingredients: 200g/7oz cherries from a jar or tin, strained with juice retained,  30g/1oz caster sugar,  splash red wine,  1 orange, juice only,  100ml/3Â½fl oz double cream, whipped
